mapper.select: SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, REG_DATETIME AS regDatetime, MINWON_TYPE AS minwonType, MINWON_STATUS AS minwonStatus, MINWON_CONTENT AS minwonContent, HANDLE_CONTENT AS handleContent, UPDATE_DATETIME AS updateDatetime, LAST_MODIFY_EMP_NAME AS lastModifyEmpName FROM ATMS_MINWON_MNG

SELECT JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, REG_DATETIME AS regDatetime, MINWON_TYPE AS minwonType, MINWON_STATUS AS minwonStatus, MINWON_CONTENT AS minwonContent, HANDLE_CONTENT AS handleContent, UPDATE_DATETIME AS updateDatetime, LAST_MODIFY_EMP_NAME AS lastModifyEmpName FROM ATMS_MINWON_MNG WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, REG_DATETIME = #{regDatetime}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_MINWON_MNG WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, REG_DATETIME = #{regDatetime}

UPDATE ATMS_MINWON_MNG SET JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, MINWON_TYPE = #{minwonType}, MINWON_STATUS = #{minwonStatus}, MINWON_CONTENT = #{minwonContent}, HANDLE_CONTENT = #{handleContent}, UPDATE_DATETIME = #{updateDatetime}, LAST_MODIFY_EMP_NAME = #{lastModifyEmpName} WHERE BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, REG_DATETIME = #{regDatetime}

INSERT INTO ATMS_MINWON_MNG ( JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, TERMINAL_NO, REG_DATETIME, MINWON_TYPE, MINWON_STATUS, MINWON_CONTENT, HANDLE_CONTENT, UPDATE_DATETIME, LAST_MODIFY_EMP_NAME ) VALUES ( #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{terminalNo}, #{regDatetime}, #{minwonType}, #{minwonStatus}, #{minwonContent}, #{handleContent}, #{updateDatetime}, #{lastModifyEmpName} )
